attributes.action: House of Fraser to reinstate their ban on selling real fur
attributes.additional_details: Not only is it selfish when their are so many alternatives such as faux fur, besides the pure fact of killing animals for their fur is wrong - they are kept in disgusting and cruel conditions
attributes.background: To urge the new management of House of Fraser to reinstate their ban on selling fur. Since being taken over by new management, they have lifted the ban that they previously had on selling fur.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for House of Fraser
